targets.query: SELECT sum(blocker) FROM (SELECT last(value) as "blocker" FROM  "blocker_violations" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project" )
SELECT mean(coverage) FROM (SELECT last(value) as "coverage" FROM  "coverage" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project" )
SELECT min(coverage) FROM (SELECT last(value) as "coverage" FROM  "coverage" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project" )
SELECT sum(critical) FROM (SELECT last(value) as "critical" FROM  "critical_violations" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project" )
SELECT mean(reliabilities) FROM (SELECT last(value) as "reliabilities" FROM  "reliability_rating" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project" )
SELECT mean(securities) FROM (SELECT last(value) as "securities" FROM  "security_rating" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project" )
SELECT mean(maintenability) FROM (SELECT last(value) as "maintenability" FROM  "sqale_rating" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project" )
SELECT value  FROM  "blocker_violations" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"

targets.query: SELECT SUM(valuePerProject) FROM (SELECT LAST("value") as valuePerProject FROM "tests" GROUP BY "project")
SELECT SUM(valuePerProject) FROM (SELECT LAST("value") as valuePerProject FROM "component_tests" GROUP BY "project")
SELECT SUM(valuePerProject)  FROM (SELECT LAST("value") as valuePerProject FROM "e2e_tests" GROUP BY "project")
SELECT value  FROM  "critical_violations" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"
SELECT value FROM "bugs" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"
SELECT value FROM "vulnerabilities" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"
SELECT value FROM "code_smells" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"
SELECT value FROM "coverage" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"
SELECT value FROM "tests" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"
SELECT value FROM "lines" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"
SELECT value FROM "duplicated_lines_density" WHERE project =~ /^(${project_name:pipe})$/ GROUP BY "project"
SELECT ceil(sum(projectValue) / 60 / 24) FROM (SELECT last(value) as projectValue FROM "sqale_index"  group by project)
SELECT sum(projectValue) FROM (SELECT last(value) as projectValue FROM "lines"  group by project)
SELECT sum(projectValue) FROM (SELECT last(value) as projectValue FROM "complexity"  group by project)
SELECT sum(projectValue) FROM (SELECT last(value) as projectValue FROM "cognitive_complexity"  group by project)
SELECT sum(projectValue) FROM (SELECT last(value) as projectValue FROM "duplicated_blocks"  group by project)
SELECT sum(projectValue) FROM (SELECT last(value) as projectValue FROM "code_smells"  group by project)
SELECT sum(projectValue) FROM (SELECT last(value) as projectValue FROM "new_code_smells"  group by project)
select last("technology") as "language", last("value") as "usage" from ncloc_language_distribution group by project

list.description: Select project to filter dashboard data
list.label: Project
list.name: project_name
